review:
Healthy food at a great price. Both veg and non veg option under 200/- along with a can of coke.
Great options to choose from the filling and the super load of the veggies makes it taste super yummmm....
Loved the way the entire filling goes inside the pita bread and the bread is really very different.
Personally I find this better than sub way even their salads are great
name: Pita Pit

review: A Saturday afternoon , one tends to be lazy after a week of working.... But your coffee routine doesn't change... So while it was about time to have a coffee , I thought of trying a coffee from slay, and I was really impressed with the way the coffee was delivered. Opted for a Hot coffee and a cold coffee, and a hot chocolate as well. Everything came in paper packaging and coffee was really hot , so had to be cautious taking off the aluminum foil cup lids, this kind of packaging I experienced for the first time and it was simply great. review: If there is one place I am in love with than it is Farzi Cafe, I am yet to have a bad Experience with Food at Farzi ,tried it in India and Abroad and the experience gets better Everytime , every time I feel I will repeat from my previous order there is something new to consider and order. name: Farzi Cafe

Surprisingly I always thought the greens here are artificial but saw the notices around the restaraunt that the greens are real and may be damaged. The menu is really vast largely Italian & Chinese with Pizza, Pasta , burgers, sandwiches, with a great blend of range of coffee and tea with Mocktails as well. We were served by Rikky and he was too good , was attending the table every 5 minutes , updating on the status of delivery of each and every dish. Food on quality and quantity is very good. I can have this now on any given day. A slightly sweet and tangy dish and u loved it. You can also order for more appams while having it. Dahi kabab is one thing very few places get it right and this one did excellently , apart from that the Kulfi - Jamun that's their signature Kulfi as well, is a must have. Loved the platter of papada and chutneys that they serve while you place an order. And this is the best time pass ever. They also retail a lot of pickles and spices and you can pick up 200 gm bottles and...read more
name: Jamun

review: Brown rice is loaded with health benefits and when the food comes done in rice bowls that has got a gravy item , veggies and brown rice. I love paneer and potatoes and these combo comes in easy option. Best part one portion is more than enough for one person and starts from Rs. 149/- for Rajma rice with potatoes and all these rice bowls are within 229/- even for paneer dishes ( paneer Tikka gravy , Paneer Makhani , Mattar paneer etc ) So a meal for a person for around 200/- isn't it a deal. And a must try is the mock meat biryani that's a good pick for Tuesday and Thursday also for households who avoids non veg on these days. Good quality of food with good quantities. For a 6 people we...read more
name: Indilish

review:
If you love authentic Indian cuisine than this place needs to be in your list for more than one reason.
They offer amazing Vegetarian and non veg food from old Delhi.

The Dal makhani is amazing. Try their Palak paneer you would love it. The dish which I loved here was egg curry , think delicious gravy that speaks for itself. And the dessert are really outstanding

A live kulfi counter that offers kulfi from outside as well as take away. Try the pan Kulfi you will love it and other than that the Gulab Jamun is also very good.

Loved the service and the entire dinning Experience.
name: Daryaganj

review:
A vegetarian who loves North Indian food can not miss to visit this place.

Especially for the ones who find it very difficult to decide on the menu. The unlimited food option thali is not only sumptuous but also makes it easy to try the entire Rajathani , Gujarati cusine in one go. Unlimited food is the USP of the place and the service is absolutely outstanding. Whenever you feel like having good vegetarian food , and don't know what to have or with someone who makes it impossible to decide on the order. This is the place to go.

Right on the main road it's in the outer circle. And service is outstanding. Feels like your mom is feeding you s that's the kind of love they serve with.
name: Rajdhani

review:
A eating out is always a second option when one had Kids and grandparents together at home...
And we love home delivery bcos then all can have the food together.

So here I ordered for Chicken Tikka , Paneer Tikka in starters and Malai Kofte with Mushroom masala at home, while in-laws prefer to have the home made breads ( chapati ). And they just loved both the gravy dishes. mushroom were very well made and the Malai Kofte were very soft and delicious.

Everyone loved the food so it's kinda of added to reorder list for Vegetarian and non Vegetarian food
name: Wakhra Swaad

While Ghaziabad may be still UP, Indirapuram is all gearing up to compete with the Dinning scene and clubbing scene of Delhi and Gurgaon and over a dozen new bars and restaurants have come up in less than six months and even the existing ones are reinventing themselves with unique offerings to be the best they could be.
name: Mystery Of Food

review:
Have tried the food at Red Mango in Gurgaon and since then it's been my go to place. This is for the first time I tried their Coffee and Sandwiches , and I can confidently say this is now my personal favorite.

A tall cup of Cappuccino was made perfectly ( Better than any coffee chain for that matter ) and the Pest Paneer sandwich was delicious. The brand does not compromise on the quantity and quality of ingredients that's what I love about this place. Huge chunks of Paneer perfectly marinated and bread was perfectly crispy. Loved this sandwich.

When in doubt go with the item on menu for what the brand is famous for. Loved this place for being such a cute space and name - Red Mango.
name: Red Mango

review: A place that's on the 2nd floor but a great place to hangout with friends and someone special. The live singer Aamir Hasn was really great. Great place to sit down for conversations I ordered for their chakhna platter and that comes with 6 cones of every of my favorite stuff... So this is Station Nibble Platter A serving that comes with 6 different #munchies 1. #PopCorn 2 #ChannaJorGharam 3 #WasabiPeanuts 4 #StreetChips 5 #cheesyNuts 6 #MasalaPeanuts And trust me all this lasted till our time here... name: Station Bar

review:
This place is the cutest ever cake place that has so much to offer, given the space it has. Cup cakes , Pastries, Cookies, Cakes , donuts , Choco chips , candies , you name it and they have it as a bakery.
Had been visiting this places for quite sometime and if I have time I personally go for picking up the cakes rather than order ( there is so much tempting stuff in here ).

And this time I got their Signature cake for a colleague s birthday. The cake was Triangular unlike the regular square or circular cakes. And it was loaded with chocolate.
Everyone loved it.
name: Ka Eclairs & Kafe

review: This is my kind of place that serves Chinese and the North Indian at the same time. I love the restaraunt who make your choice easier while you are running through the menu and you finalise on order , Pankaj here did that for us by helping us pick what we can go for. Platter on offer 2 in veg and non veg covers the most of the stuff you wish to have on your plate. I opted for a veg and a non veg platter and for the price this food was too much. Platter available are Amritsari and Chinjabi ( combination of Chinese and Punjabi ) both available in veg and non veg options) Veg is priced 599/- and non veg is 695/- and I am not kidding check out the menu and then check the pictures . review: It‚Äôs Delhi and it‚Äôs the happiest when it rains.So here we were at Smokey‚Äôs BBQ & Grill in Khan Market this Sunday while the weather in Delhi was absolutely cloud 9. name: Smokey's BBQ And Grill

review: A Monday is not really a Monday when you get to dine with kids at a cute little cafe that served more than just food. This place is in sector 62, and I am wondering why didn't came here earlier. The menu is wide and the pricing is just perfect, small cute cafe that served us like a pro. Pizza , Pasta, french fries , loaded nachos, kiwi shake , Lemonade , and Phad Thai , everything that we ordered here was just great, and more importantly value for money. name: Munchin Cafe

review:
I am a soya lover and love all form of chaap frm starters to main course. This place really served me well with stuffed Soya chaap and Tri color chaap. The chaaaps were very well marinated, done perfectly crispy in the Tandoor and the taste was amazing. Crispy on outside and super juicy inside.
Apart from this I tried their Tomato Sorba that was okay too. Gulab Jamun I had for desserts and just loved it more so for the shape As they are not round and I love these.
Tried kullad chai after the lunch as it was rainy. Bcos in the beginning we had the butter milk which was full on Punjabi style.
name: Dhaba By Punjab

review:
Salads, fish fingers and Pizzaa was simply amazing , so this salad and soup is a combo and for the first time I ordered a cream of mushroom delivered at home and this one was by far the best . Delivered hot and too good on quantity with a perfect taste. The Farm Pizza was also very nicely made and baked to perfection. .
Not sure why they have named it as Capri wings but the food is too good. Especially non veg, my kids tried the Fish Fingers for the first time and they loved them
name: Capri Wings

review: If you are trying to be on diet or on a lookout for some healthy food then hit this place without a second thought. The Parfrait range is amazing. Tried their Mango and Berries Parfrait and both were amazing. Loaded with fresh fruits in good quantity, Cereal flakes adding to the crunch and the Fruit flavored yogurt made it just the perfect thing , one might want to have to satiate the hunger pranks, complete delicious lunch, healthyfood and even a substitute for the dessert. The burger was also loaded with veggies and green and a very healthy patty. Tried the better half salad that was yum. Super fast service and good quality food. Our order was served with 10 mins and that was...read more
name: Red Mango

review:
If ever you have craved for pakroa and especially Moong Dal Pakora then you should look further just call for the Veg Pakora platter from Foobar and trust me you will love it this comes with Paneer fingers and Potato wafers Pakora - very fine slices and very crispy.

This is a super cute place with all blue from outside seems like a outlet from the streets of UK.

The best part is it's menu and everything is super amazing. Had the Charcoal Ice cream in a red Cone, truly first time ever and I think only served like this in Delhi. Haven't came across any other outlet serving something like this so far. The service and rates are very nice. All the things are produced fresh and in house, including the colorful waffle cones for ice cream

I choose a red one and the charcoal ice cream was super yummy.

The place is very small but the service is so fast that you will not feel you being searching for a corner.
name: Cremeborne

Else the big problem that the rolls stuff gets to the bottom and then you are struggling with finishing it , the sauces start dipping and stuff that doesn't happen. A must try is their Soya chaap roll either Bunna for spicy lover or Muglai for mild spices , just loved it and one more thing that I liked is their Chicken popcorns Absolutely value for money and one roll is a complete meal. name: Rolls Mania

review:
Have recently hosted a World cup match screening at this place and was super floored with their service . We were 20 people and they gave us a dedicated space with 2 attendants constay checking on food order and delivering very promptly.
The food was amazing this pizza is worth a try , we had main course and the Dal makhani was out of the world and so was Dum alloo.

Good service and great ambience.
They had a dollwallah on the house which kept the momentum up for the entire event.
name: The Darzi Bar & Kitchen

name: 36 Lebzelter

review:
A place that is huge , has got great music and Lovely ambience.
Great range of Mocktails and sitting for big groups. Cozy corners. Must try the pizza here amazing range of Pizza that is wood fired and the service is outstanding. Both chicken and Paneer options are good.

We we're served by Kiran and he was very pro in updating about our order and changing plates while various starters were served.
The mezze platter came with freshly made dips and it was good enough for serving 2 people.
Had a good experience
name: The Royale

review:
This is my 2nd visit to this place and since McD is not operational so to find a good burger is not a challenge when you have Wat A burger on the 2nd floor in the food court.

Tried their Belgium fries for the first time and must say they are amazing with loads of flavors in which they are available. I tried the Indian Chaat and this was good.
Kids had their Chocolate shake.

The price of the burger is Just Rs. 140 for the paneer burger which I tried and it was good.
name: Wat-a-Burger!

review:
Had one of the most amazing churos delivered at my place. Have tried Churos from a lot of place this is first time I tried getting Churros on home delivery in Indirapuram. Normally I would have preferred to have it , but this place did a Fab job with the delivery and the trick was in packaging. They arrived super crispy and Hot - wrapped in butter paper in a biodegradable box that let them be as is.
In Shakes ordered for Banana Honey and Strawberry and both where very good on quantity and taste.

Cheese cakes jar we're too good. Mango one had fresh mango and so was the Chocolate one.

Would love to recommend this place to all Churros and Jar Cake lovers.
name: D'ah

review:
So this place is very close to my home and we love hanging out here. The Buffet dinner is worth a Experience here for the kind of variety of food they serve and the ambience is such a mood setter for a romantic dinner. Love the sitting by the water body - the natural breeze and delicious food from The place. They keep hosting a lot of food fest and all of them are amazingly great on options in terms of menu and the Chef do great job in terms of curation of menu.
Recently went for the on the Ganges menu and this had the food from all cities which are on the shores of Ganga, starting from Uttarakhand to kanpur, banaras , Kolkata etc and the food was amazing.
name: The Creative Kitchen - Radisson Noida

review: My favorite Japanese restaurant in Delhi. And the Hanami special menu was like a flashback from our last Trip to Japan. food that was loaded with my favorite ingredients. Mocktail that was a slush of fresh fruit , had this musk melon and Kiwi drink and it was amazing. Normally it's a cocktail but the restaurant was kind enough to make it as per me. The salad we tried Beet and Artichoke salad is the best version of beet root salad I have had so far. I. Main course the Tofu streak with fried rice was amazing. And the desert was super loaded. This festival has got some amazing menu for food and drink and I strongly suggest the Japanese food lovers to visit this place at least one while Happy...read more
name: Guppy

review: One should eat the breakfast like a king. And this remains by far my favorite quote on food. So here we are at Anglow in Khan Market New Delhi to unveil the new breakfast menu. name: Anglow

Super fresh and Super healthy , everything that's a power packed Nutrition.

And the treat doesn't end here what's more drool worthy was the #MangoStickyRice loaded with freshly cut Mango.
This is probably my 4th or 5th Salad Bowl from go gourmet and every time I decide this is the best ...... Before I had quinoa salad and then Summer Tofu and now this one has taken the space of my new favorite
name: Signature Salads And More

review:
This was my 3rd order and have already had the cake from their 22 outlet which was liked by everyone and this one was no less.
Had a chocolate cake and the quality is too good.
They deliver on time and take care of the specifications given.
name: Cake Desire

review: It's been a week of eating out and indulging in Junk so while I missed to carry my Tiffin... Thought of ordering from a healthy place. Loved the menu of This place only Salads and Dessert is what I loved. Ordered a Salad - Quinoa with Grilled vegetables and trust me a Salad can't get healthier and tastier than this one. Along with my Favorite fruit dessert Mango sticky rice. The Salad was great on quantity and the veggies made it taste yumm with Quinoa and the dressing was very very different... Soya chaap in Mumbai style was an amazing Chaap dish that I had, this was very well marinated with loads of onion and red chilli Tadka on it. Burgers are good pick here. In starters I will strongly recommend their Veg Platters Indian or American ....read more
name: Detroit

name: Leaf N Loaf

Tried Bread Bowl - Roasted Veggies, and this was a full on meal with amazing pesto sauce Gravy with loads of veggies and cheese in it . And the Heaven in a bowl is truly super indulging with 4 scoops of ice cream and amazing brownie. Loved this place as they allowed...read more
name: I Sacked Newton

review:
After the meeting when I saw Chaayos in Sector 16 Noida , I was very happy to try mango lassi that's from their summer menu along with chilli toast and Thandi chai.
Mango Lassi was too good , Bhelpuri is also one of my favorite pick here after Poha. And this Bun egg is absolutely love for people like me who only like to have boilded in the egg family. Creamy yummy bun egg mildly spiced is just the perfect thing to have guilt free.
name: Chaayos - Meri Wali Chai

review: The Starling Mall at Sector 110 is becoming the new weekend destination and this cafe right at the entry from both site is just my kind of place for a Sunday Brunch. Small tables with sitting of 2 & 4 to a good couch space of hosting a family of 8 this place is designed to sit back and relax while you have your food. Not so fancy interiors , clear design this place is to just unwind.
name: Where We Met

review: Coffee places that has a open sitting under the trees gives us the right kind of ambience for enjoying our coffee. Coffee Bond is just like that Cottage restaraunt that has sufficient sitting in the open. Visited this place in fall winters and just loved the setting. This one is in sector 32 of Gurgaon and offers some amazing food with a range of Coffee.
name: Coffee Bond

review:
Was looking to order for Soya chaap Masala and since wah ji wah was not taking delivery as I ordered at 11:30 so opted for this outlet.
Pricing was good. My order was partially delivered with Kheer missing - 2 plates and in place 1 Ras Malai was send by the outlet , since it was a COD order and the rider was from Zomato so have to make the full payment. But When I made a complain to the outlet they said we will deliver the kheer once it's ready and nothing of that sort happened.
Food quality was okay. Soya chaap was good on taste.
name: Bade Bhai Ka Brother Dhaba

review:
When a delhiwalla gets to spot a Chaayos in Chandigarh. It's such a homely feeling.
As always I had my Kullad wala adarak chai, Paneer burji bun and Mom's Poha are my all time favorite here. One is light and the other one is so filling that it serves as a perfect lunch. But this time I also tried something new that looked really appetizing - stuffed Paneer Kulcha and it's was really very nice and more filling than the Paneer Burji bun
Even I love their Pahadi Chai - Chaayos version of kashmiri Kawa. Aromatic and guilfree. Normally I have it after the meal.
name: Chaayos - Meri Wali Chai

review: If you stay in Noida rather the recently developed part of Noida then you must checkout the Food outlets in sector 104, this is my third visit to this sector in a span of less than a month and I am seriously amazed with the food outlets here. With Pind Balluchi , I always play it safe with starters and my regular order in starters is the Veg Platter because it covers 2 peices from any 4 of choice of starters and that‚Äôs like a wishful way of starting , as most of the time you want to have a little bit of everything. So this always work with me and keeps the bill in control too.
name: Pind Balluchi

So my recent visit to Mumbai bought me to Palladium Mall for some office work and I realized this place is just around the corner at a 6 minutes drive to Utopia and Immediately I planned a quick dinner.
name: Plum by Bent Chair

review: This is not the first time that I tried this place. This was my 2nd experience and this one was a Dine in unlike delivery earlier. Asian food served to it's best. Tried Sushi , Dumplings and soups. Now that's something I have had at other places as well. But the quality and the price at which this outlet serves is really super cool... Else Sushi literally costs much more than any other Asian dish. Something that I tried for the time in Asian cusines was Ramen - A soup noodles with veggies and Protien of Choice. name: Asian Fun

review: I have never been to Champa Gali and had no idea that this place has some really cool hanging out places. Just a day before Valentine's we visited this place and just loved the experience here. The Italian food that we had was super amazing. Peri Peri fries were super delicious and the portion size was too good. Pizza came as a jumbo size with loads of mayo on it and the crust was thin baked to perfection. Also had the special pasta - Orange Pasta served with real oranges. Good service , nice cozy place where you can play...read more
name: Social Street Cafe

review:
North Indian food is by far my favorite cusines and when ever there is a delivery outlet that opens up, I definitely try to try it.
For the first time ordered makke ki Roti and sasro ka saag and this came out ready well. Along with Paneer achari.
The roti was pretty big in size and 1 was sufficient for 1 person. Saag was very nicely made... Close to home cooked one so just loved it.
name: Punjabi Desh

This place is one of such places that offers great range of sweets to explore from and the quality is too good. I was a fan of Ras Malai and Gulab Jamun while we had an outlet in Indirapuram. today had our breakfast at this place for the first time as I have always had the sweets from Gulab Sweets And I was surprised with the food as well. Poori Sabji served with a glass of Buttermilk and green chilli pickle , 4 poori served with Alloo Sabji just for Rs. 70/- , this is definitely the best value breakfast. name: Baris

review: I first had Natural Ice cream in Mumbai in 2008 , after i have heard so much about these ice creams from people staying in Mumbai. name: The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf

name: Wah

review: Perfect point to drop in at after a good meal for thats sweets craving for desserts. A health freak may try from options of fruit juices and shakes while dessert lovers can groove on the yummy ice creams... though they have snacking items too but we had only ice creams and juices. If you like having cane juice and look for hygienic places then this one is for you
name: Cheers

review: If it's about coffee then Cafe coffee day makes the best in any city.... their frape is so close to my heart that even with soar throat I don't opt for hot option. A perfectly balanced taste of coffee with perfect sweet taste lifts up t spirit anytime of the day... this place is open till very late ... had my coffee at 11:30 and loved the night ambience just outside the store with almost no traffic hustle on the road
name: Cafe Coffee Day

review: Naturals ice cream had been my favorite ever since I had first tasted it in Mumbai... and I simply love having it anytime. Feels lucky if u get hold of Sitafal ( seasonal). Probably this is the only ice cream in the world which makes this fruit so yum as an ice cream. If u love fruits then you ll love these ice creams. True to its name it's the closest to the natural fruit and so creamy texture. You may try mango or coconut... rather u may pick any fruit flavors and enjoy t deliciousness overload in each bite
name: Naturals

review: If you are in love with cakes and bakes then this place is icing on the cake. I personally feel renaissance hotel is everything but exceptional and beautiful property and the eating option they have are all very well maintained and unique so is this place. A eye catching interior done in sticking red color always is a treat to eyes. The candies and cakes and pastries do all the talking with you. And the way they display the stuff adds to the overall appeal. I don't think I need to explain anything the review is head over heels in love with this place.
name: Mumbai Express - Renaissance Hotel

review: As the name suggests this is one place where you are treated like a king.. either you go by ala carte or order from their hand picked combos starting from 1800-3000 per person for a royal 4 course meal. A chef curated meal that would leave you craving for more but the quantities are good enough that you can't have more. A perfect setting for a romantic evening with your partner they also have a private dining space... so come fall in love with this royal treat. And food is outstanding. If you love Chinese then this is truly heaven next to the mesmerising nature view.
name: Emperor's Court - Renaissance Hotel

review: There are few perks of staying at renaissance... one of them is the complementary breakfast at Fratelli Fresh and this is a place that I just love having breakfast at. They have amazingly courteous staff and a super delicious meal to kick start a day with taste that stays. Their chefs are always up around to serve you with the fresh to the core preparation. And they don't wait for u to come and pick stuff of ur choice they rather come to you over ur table offering you stuff and trust me u ll go awwwwh that's so sweet. Do I need to write anything further to convince you to try this place. You can see chef Sundeep how happy he is to serve freshly made doughnuts. Their life kitchen is...read more
name: Fratelli Fresh - Renaissance Hotel

review: Exactly under the KFC; at Haiko place this is not difficult to locate... made right on the passage this is a quite a nice place to sit only if the weather is favorable....nice cozy sitting probably ideal for couples. Service is good and coffee is what ccd is all about.
name: Cafe Coffee Day

review: The size of the restaurant and the length and width of the store definitely gives you the amazing sense of ambience if thats what matters to you. Very nicely done interiors thats inviting enough to make you park and walk in. If you are looking for sweets or gifting options in sweets , dry fruits and bakery let me tell you then this is the place to go for in Indrapuram for sure if not ghaziabad . You ll amazed to see the packaging, colors and range of options. They have something for any budget you have on mind. Dinning experience is very good . Sweets also i have not seen so much variety in any sweet shop so far in Indrapuram. Dont miss to pick their rasgulla which is currently being...read more
name: Bikanervala

review:
Good service nice ambience ‚Ä¶ rather fast service that what one goes to KFC for. This one just near to costa coffee becomes if u extended ur coffee conversation and u have to quickly rush back after grabing a bite‚Ä¶

View just like costa is additional incentive
name: KFC

review: More than the place its more about whom you spend time with at that place. So coffee being my all time stress buster. At Great india place this place is my favorite place. Hot or cold coffee with a blueberry muffin is my regular pick. Thr best part with mall outlet is that you can enjoy the coffee , company and if you are alone you can enjoy coffee and mall view and walkins
name: Costa Coffee

review: Starbucks was the 1st coffee place that came up at Huda city. It clearly became a place i wanted to be at before boarding the train or after deboarding while going to office or coming back. Spread across 2 floor and well lite place where morning coffee can be relished with morning sun. Service is always outstanding. And i am always divided between having the coffee there or opt for take away.
name: Starbucks Coffee

review: If you are there for a dine in then let me warn you to better take a home delivery as the staircase that leads to the store is not kept well‚Ä¶stinky smell, hundereds of flies and deberis‚Ä¶ but once u in the store and a non veg lover then this wudnt really not even matter to you‚Ä¶ if u are a vegetarian thn better look for something else. We ordered for Chicken tikaa, veg platter, mutton rogan josh, chicken briyani with lemon and green drink. All non veg is superb but veg when i ask for paneer roll they didnt had so i was kind of heart broken. But kheer is good to go for if u hav a sweet tooth
name: Nazeer Foods

review: If you would want to have cakes then this place is a really nice place. Operating in a very small place but good on quality. Even they do return gifts for bday creating customised chocolate packets ( reffer pics 50 nos for 300 each ). Bakery biscuits are also good but you have to buy open cudnt see much range in assoted packages. Patties are very oily so wud not suggest for this one. But pastries are a must to have especially black forest.
name: Bakes N Cakes

review: PUNJABI TO THE CORE‚Ä¶ A place where i forced my italian and chinesse lover friends since it was a treat on me. Being a hardcore north indian lover i had my eyes set on this place since the day this was in making. Okay sitting is ample but not a huge place. Nicely done interiors Punjabi to the core. Thats communicated through everything they offer ‚Ä¶even a pure steel cutlery. Amazing Veg and Non veg thali at a great price. But since we were a group of 9 people so we went for Tandori chicken, dhahi kabab and vegetarian platter. Dahi kabab was not great. But veg platter was a great pick. And tandoori chicken was really yum‚Ä¶so well prepared that one cudnt really smell and say its...read more
name: Ambarsari Chowk

review: If Chocolate rules your mind all the time, then tis room deserves your time sometimes. Very intelligently done interior, with ample sitting space and the eye catchy displays to definitely distract you while you are figuring out what not to buy ( as you might want to pick everything ). You ll definately spend more time on the counter then you do in a normal outlet Chocolates you see. Amazing gifting options u can get with really cool innovation with chocolates. Also they are so nicely packed that you can just walk, in pick one and walk out. Chocolates are really very good. Since we went after lunch for deserts therefore we didnt tried much other than chocolate and donut but frankly...read more
name: The Chocolate Room

review: Sweet little place just next to crossword store with such beautiful pink exterior fasade does catches ur eyes especially in the afternoon. I was coming back after lunch from moms kitchen which is on the same road so when i saw the board i cudnt ressit my self to stop over at this place. It was easter day so they had lots of easter egg variations, all colorful so much that i was tempted to buy them. Their pasteries and tart are delicious. Cudnt try much so cant comment on food but bakery was too good.
name: Pastry Cottage

review: Good on service and the obious place to look out for salad and healthy subs‚Ä¶since they have very limited sitting as usual for a subway therefore most of the time one ends up having a take away only‚Ä¶if u like salads and eggs you may provably sud try salad with egg as add on with ur choice of sauces
name: Subway

review:
If Chai is ur cup of tea then this place is definately a stop over for you. I went there with my all girls gang for farewell of a dear friend and being close to office we were looking for a place for chit chaat. Thankfully this place did gave us an amazing experience. Their options in tea made us have 3 rounds of Tea ( customised with extra extra ginger )...though being a coffee person initially i had ordered a cappuccino 1st but when i tasted t tea i quite liked it and ended up having more of it. Pakora platter is must to have if u are a chai pakora person... even their onion rings, french fries and masala nachos are good..
Best part is the cost...nothing compared to the quality they serve
name: Tea Halt

review: An ambience thats invites you in if you are at the hotel‚Ä¶ being a die hard coffee person i went inside assuming its a cafe as the name goes on the sign board‚Ä¶ but its a dine in. And the buffet out here is quite elaborate but sorry to say hardly any range for coffee :(
name: Cafe Central - Radisson Gurugram Sohna Road City Center

review: Since i have been regular at Dunkin donuts and simply love their naughty lucy burger. And the combo no 2 is my constant pick while its just me. This time along with the regular pick i went for combo 6 as well ,thats a hot chocolate 1+1, so if u r a hot chocolate person go ahead and treat urself on this one. Else its a strict no no. Esp if u dont have a sweet tooth. And the ambience of this store is amazing but guys plz look into the hygiene of the store too ( this one is for t admin here).
name: Dunkin' Donuts

review: Nice place to chill out‚Ä¶good food, lovely ambience and a very courteous staff‚Ä¶done in all white and good spacing inspite of being not so big a place makes u peaceful with the setting‚Ä¶the food portions are good in quantity.
name: Smoke House Deli

review: If you are expecting a typical kuttu ki poori and aloo tamater sabji from the new navratra thali then you might be a lil disappointed. Else on the quality and quantity of food this is average and not worth it for t price paid. While the rest of the navratra menu is simply yuuummm and a must try option here
name: Haldiram's

review: A little too hyped a place. I find the sauces really average‚Ä¶may because over a period of time after having so much mcd ur palate and taste buds develope ‚Ä¶ but still i wud it another try
name: Burger King

review: So have got a home delivery done not by choice but by chance. And going by the benchmark this time i planned to do otherwise. So while Chawla is famous for the non veg and specially tandoor preparation. I thought of ordering chinese. Well quanities for a full plate noodle and chilli paneer was really impressive and so was the chutneys and onion( not to mention with chinese also it was the regular green chutney :( ). If you look for a spicy treat than you cant go by chilli paneer as it has got a typical sweet after taste as if its cooked in honey. But size of paneer was really impressive and nicely fried too. Noodles were above average. Overall preffer tikka or north indian dishes over...read more
name: Chawla's Tandoori Junction

review: Superb place.‚Ä¶ of all the things the moment you enter Epicuria parking Fio wud start making you feel special by designated space for parking for FIO. And the parking takes you directly to fio. Lush green porch gives a very nice feeling‚Ä¶and as you enter inside , larger than life ceiling hieght would amaze you with the decor elements.full of natural light is truly an experience if you are looking for an amazing experience. This is one outlet that offers you an experience rather than just food.
name: FIO Cookhouse and Bar

review: I have not been to this place. But have had the cake from Binge on my birthday and a friends Bday. Must say the cake was very very very tasty and no wonder why few team members who are from gurgaon rate this place the best for cakes. And sweetness is just perfect to the taste of the bread base in the cake
name: Binge

review: Coffee at its best. More than coffee at this place what you enjoy is the view. Right in the central atrium of the mall you can sip your coffee and have a great view of the mall and mall walkins at the same time. Range of food is good and cheapest being tge biscoti for 20 bucks is a must to have with your hot or cold coffee if you are not out an out a foodie but would like to have something to munch. Service is good and so is the coffee aroma.
name: Barista

review:
Loved the mocktails here Virgin Mojito - A very refreshing drink,
Strawberry & Orange ,But the best was
Watermelon Cooler - because of the refreshing color anf taste. Food is amazing from starters to main course. Its a must to visit place. The option of sitting is indoor as well as outdoor which makes it a destination to your mood and weather
name: The Chatter House

review: While it comes to delicious gravies this small place is a good take away or home delivery option for veg and non veg. As the name says chick chicken, no wonder they make amazing chicken, also paneer dishes are no less. Rich gravy makes their paneer labadaar and kadai paneer really yummy. Methi malai matar is also a good variation for t standard vegetarian menu. But dals are not that great. You might also find the menu being very limited.
name: Chick Chicken Barbeque

review: For all that junk food while u swear by not to have it again ‚Ä¶mcd is yet another place that makes you still eat it. But after kids this comes as an obious option not just for happy meal n french fries but of course the quick delivery and not to mention the baby chair.
name: McDonald's

review: Haldirams is a definitely a choice of people who have got a sweet tooth. The best part of munching or dining is that you have a wide menu of sweet dishes to be picked as desert. Chole bature is a must to have for its non oily Bhaturas. Even there plattrrs are good
name: Haldiram's

review: Though Italian is not my favorite cusine still this place has won my heart over. As the name goes Crusty so are their pizza that has an amazing crispy thin crust. Hot pizza served with a dip is must to have. We had paneer tika pizza with a pasta ,cottage cheese salad with coke and green apple mojito. Followed by a Nutella desert. Must say it was an amazing dinnig experience. The staff here goes that extra mile to serve evry dish and come at least twice to take feedback. And is very ineractive. If you are a person who would want to have lunch and completely focus on food then you might find so much interactive staff annoying.
name: Tossin Pizza

review: A cozy corner for chatter boxes. A good places to hangout with friends. Drinks and happy hours are like a regular stuff. As the name goes Warehouse the interiors are completely in sync with the name.going by the menu since its as per the day so you can keep visiting anyday for a different food experiences.The platters are value for money and good in quantiy if you r going group. Even sandwitches ‚Ä¶

review: This place is our regular place for office parties. . . And i love their mocktails. Try Orange Mojito and Watermelon star. Hmmm about food.‚Ä¶a fairly decent place for food too , do try there dahi kabab. And most important of all they serve pop corns too
name: Manhattan Bar & Brewery

review:
This is a place to be in on a thursday night when they offer a special ladies night with a selected mocktails and cocktails on the bar. So its like too good an option when u have huge group to go out with and you hav a fair mix of girl frds in the gang. I have had 2 amazing experiences when we had an amazing evening with a group of 4 and 8 people and we ended up with a bill of 1300 and 3150 respectively‚Ä¶isnt it a great deal.

But all said and starter menu is very limited so thats something u wud want to consider if food is that what u looking for
name: Soi 7 Pub & Brewery

review: This place is amazing for a coffee. If you r a coffee lover by heart then tis place in t heart of delhi is a must visit for you. The food really depends on what u like with coffee
name: Cafe Coffee Day - The Square

Ordered for a 4 cold coffees, grilled paneer tika sandwitch along with a plate of french fries.
